text: The man replied, “Even if a thousand shekels of silver 18:12 1,000 shekels is approximately 25.1 pounds or 11.4 kilograms of silver. were weighed out into my hands, I would not raise my hand against the son of the king. For we heard the king command you and Abishai and Ittai, ‘Protect the young man Absalom for my sake.18:12 A few Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, Vulgate, and Syriac; most Hebrew manuscripts Whoever you may be, protect the young man Absalom. or Let no one touch the young man Absalom.’
